WorkItem.ClosedComment: user misconception, if this is still an issue please reopen and POST the character file
WorkItem.Description:
After creating a new character, selecting talents (including titan's grip), and then running the optimizer, the off hand becomes unselectable either in the right-hand paper doll or on the left-hand item list.  Before the optimizer is run, the off hand can be selected, but only shows green "mitigation" scale, not dps scale.  This happens in 2.2.20 and previous versions (earliest tested was 2.2.17 if I recall correctly).
Â 
The second issue is on the stats screen, execute has 0 uses.  Toggling the <20% execute spamming checkbox in Options->Ability Maintenance has no effect, neither does selecting the execute glyph (which shows as 0 dps in the left-hand pane with slot->glyphs selected).  Only fury was tested.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSWarr] Offhand not selectable for Fury & Execute not executing

Comments.Message:
The offhand would be unselectable if you have a Polearm in the main hand.

I don't think Fury is using exec spamming yet like Arms does
or you may be optimizing with Talents, which you shouldn't do as that has really bad results, like taking off Titan's Grip in Fury
The problem is that you have "Arms" selected in Options > Ability Maintenance.  It's trying to do an Arms rotation instead of a Fury rotation.
